title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
>Legend of the Poro King 9/9 - 9/12

I'm not even mad at this point. I'm just disappointed.
Please bring back URF

Riot: I think they want another week of Poroking for the 6th month this year


{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Where are Doom Bots?
Chilling with URF.
Riot, honestly, get your game together. That game being URF. It's been forever and Normals and ranked games are no longer fun. So bring back URF and make League great again.
Agreed it's been quite some time since URF.
Naw fam, Doom Bots, Black Market Brawlers, and Showdown are best buds at this point
Doom Bots needs to be remade from scratch. They ARE working on it that is a fact.

"We listen to our Community."
"We want URF."
"Here's Poro King again! Enjoy!"
they took urf out because only 15 champions were viable.

That's simply not true. I personally tried every single champion in URF the last time it was out, and Yasuo was the only one that was wholly unimpressive. ADCs could still use a little boost in the mode (not sure how they'd go about doing that other than giving them more AS and AD - which they've already done), but otherwise, you can seriously play just about any tank or caster in the game and be viable in URF. Plus, URF is meant to just be spell-spammy fun. I've never gotten mad in URF just because the enemy team drafted a better team than me. I always enjoy it regardless, but maybe that's just me.

First off Riot, I would like to thank you for making rotating queue a thing, and for sort of listening to the community.

I would like to point out that the order these are listed in is the order that they appeared for the first time in the rotating queue, and the number is the number of appearances we will be seeing by 9/12.

Ascension : 4
Poroking : 4
URF : 2
Hexakill : 4
One For All : 3
DnD : 2
Siege : 3
Nemesis : 1

I know there is AI re-work that needs to be done before we can see doom bots of doom, but I would really like to know why when (what feels like at least) half the comments every week are asking for URF, we have only seen it twice? Especially since this week we are seeing Nemesis Draft).

I know transparency isn't the best, because posts like L4T3NCY's post about the state of RGM and its likely direction, especially around the fact that nemesis probably wouldn't be seen, as this week shows, will be wrong. But could we please get an idea on why some game modes are showing up so often and others so rarely? Is URF really that unpopular when its out? Is Poroking / Ascension / Hexakill the best thing since summoners rift?

But it is really disheartening to look and see that most of the game modes have come out 2x as often as URF. (Counting DND Siege and Nemesis as 'new' game modes) And I know next week its going to most likely show that One for all will be there again. But where is URF? I like that game mode the most (being a support main, being able to actually do damage, make plays and all that is really a breath of fresh air and quite fun! You know, what RGM was supposed to be all about), and have seen it the least.

Solid post!
Just wanted to add one thing URF didn't come out 4/1/16 like it normally does. So really, if you think about it, we have only had one rotating URF.

There were 2 URF in RGM, the April ~~fail~~ fools day event was the Draven heads{{champion:119}} , unlike the URF two years and the URF a year before that. 

While I agree with you it not coming out like it normally does, that doesn't mean that it didn't come out for the whole of 5 days (2.5 days x 2) compaired to the 13-14 days we have come to expect around the April fools day events.

I don't even care for URF that much and even I'm wondering where the hell that game mode is at this point?
Hasn't it only been on the Rotating Game Mode Queue like, twice?
I'd rather play URF than ARAM with a giant poro for the millionth time.

We got it two weeks in a row way back in... what, April or May? It's definitely been at least 3 months since it was on there at all, and I'm starting to get tired of seeing Poro King on there every other week. I mean, I'm biased, I actually really like URF, but seriously, we've had 3 Ascensions, at least 4 Poro Kings, a Siege Mode, a couple One For Alls, and I think 2 Hexakills since the last URF. I don't think it's unreasonable of me to at least ask that it be on the roster once every, say, 2-2.5 months, is it?

> [{quoted}](name=Haltheleon,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=sKepcjgR,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-08-19T21:34:29.079+0000)
>
> We got it two weeks in a row way back in... what, April or May? It's definitely been at least 3 months since it was on there at all, and I'm starting to get tired of seeing Poro King on there every other week. I mean, I'm biased, I actually really like URF, but seriously, we've had 3 Ascensions, at least 4 Poro Kings, a Siege Mode, a couple One For Alls, and I think 2 Hexakills since the last URF. I don't think it's unreasonable of me to at least ask that it be on the roster once every, say, 2-2.5 months, is it?

Incorrect, URF appeared the weekend of April 22 and then on May 20, it has not come back since.  While other game modes have had multiple appearances since and are scheduled to be brought out more before URF appears.

Before anyone says anything... lets address the elephant in the room...
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO MEEEEEE
Lucky... I couldn't afford to be born. Too poor
Look, another month w/o URF. Another month where I won't be playing RGM.. lol

What if one for all urf became a thing?
How would that turn out.
Nemesis Draft URF mode. It needs to be a thing.

I'm 80% certain they're doing on changes to URF behind the scenes. It just wouldn't be gone this long in any other situation.

Riot knows half the playerbase really want URF and they also know the other half dislike it, so it makes sense they'd be working on it. There were quite a few problems at the core of URF (Building CDR items, most champs are pick/ban, some champs completely impossible to win with, etc).

Seeing the updates to Ascension alongside the Nexus Siege gamemode Riot is showing they're willing to make new modes and update older ones (such as URF right now most likely)

TL;DR They're very likely updating URF to make it more fun.
I'd be up for them proving me wrong, but I don't have that much faith in them.
IF they are working on it a simple post saying "We are waiting to reintroduce URF to rotating queue until we make a lot of changes" would help a lot

Yeah I have no idea why they're not saying anything, but they have been hinting at URF updates a little bit.

Maybe some sort of surprise??
Urf... Where fore art there no urf upon this que?
People just clicked here to see if Urf is coming or not and to comment about it not being there. Tbh plz no more nemesis draft i hate it and ppl keep dodging xD
ow the edge of your profile name and comment gave me a paper cut
Too many people dodging, increase the penalty for this
even something like you can't earn chest/keys for a day or something...
But you can't get mejais in urf ;3
its my Birthday 8/17/2016
Today is the 19th?

"We’re looking for your feedback as we go, so let us know."

Me: Urf please?

And I'm not those people who are salty about Urf not showing up, it's just that it's a gamemode that deserves to be commonly played, liked the others that have been introduced for more than 3 times, like Hexakill, Ascension, and Poro King. Too be honest, Urf wouldn't be requested so frequently if they released a sandbox and tweaking champ stats.



The point, Riot just please listen to your community and fans, and realize what the majority of them want.

They won't,
I know it sucks,
and I'm sorry.
Does anyone roll their eyes when we get another week of Legend of the Poro King mode again?
idk man the Poro king is the only time i can Skarner ult someone halfway across the map without a enemy poppy.
i don't mind nexus siege but its just the poroking and hexakill

Seriously, can we have one damn month without Poro King making another appearance? Since snowballs were introduced to ARAM, the only thing that really even differentiates the two is that occasionally a huge giant ass poro drops from the sky and gets instagibbed.

Oh great, the salt of all the URF lovers is here again. Time for...

...**A POSITIVE POST!** Thank you Riot for bringing us these cool game modes every week! I can't wait to play Nemesis Draft for the first time! Keep on being AWESOME! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Gotta keep the positive side since I don't have many champs so I'm not mad not having ure so draft should feel fresh
Rotating Game Mode my ass lol, at this point its "we choose what gamemode you guys play instead of rotating"
I haven't looked into it so forgive me if it has been brought up.  But does anyone want/care for some Doom Bots in Rotation?
Oh look, another week were L4T3NCY doesn't listen to the community.
